g.title: cluster_0
g.text: Epic: Support for RPC calls used by mining pools

ZcashFoundation/zebra#5624 zebrad: obsolete help text with the wrong info

ZcashFoundation/zebra#4226 Prefer faster peers, but if all peers are slow, still connect to them
